data: Lounging idly in the deserted little waiting-room was the usual shabby, bored, lonely ticket-seller, prodigiously indifferent to the grave beauty of the scene before him and to the throng of ancient memories jostling him where he stood.
bestsellers, american, 1895-1923|browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: romance|category: novels|category: american literature
